fields.name: HUI
fields.description: This bit indicates the Home unit identifier of the access

fields.name: Size
fields.description: This field indicates a binary number from 0 to 31 from which the region's Size is calculated as (Size of IG) * 2 ^(Size +12) bytes

fields.name: HUT
fields.description: This bit indicates the Home Unit Type- 0: DMI, 1:DII

fields.name: Valid
fields.description: This bit indicates if the region is valid - 0: Invalid mapping, 1:Valid region mapping

fields.name: AddrLow
fields.description: Lower order bits 43:12 of the base address of the region

fields.name: AddrHigh
fields.description: Higher order bits 51:44 of the base address of the region
